modName: King Jon Snow follower from HBO Game of Thrones Season 7
summary: My NEW Jon Snow Companion, is a King now..is grown and now is the best sword master in Skyrim, with new armor and his famous sword Longclaw. I hope you Enjoy!
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=5] [/size][/b][center][color=#d0e0e3][b][size=5][size=6] [color=#ffffff]KING JON Game of Thrones FOLLOWER[/color][/size][color=#c9daf8]
[/color]
[size=3][size=5][color=#1e84cc][color=#a4c2f4]
JON HAS RETURNED FOR A NEW UNFORGETTABLE SEASON!!!..IS
A NEW VERSION OF MY PREVIOUS JON SNOW
so..if you have installed the old one..
you can download this version and overwrite for the upgrade..[/color][/color][color=#a4c2f4]
[/color][/size]

[color=#38761D]Textures[/color]: SkySight Skins - Ultra HD 4K and 2K - Male Textures and
Real Feet Meshes by [b]fadingsignal[/b]
[color=#38761D]Default Weapon[/color] : Longclaw Jon Sword.
[color=#38761D]Location[/color] : Riverwood Inn
[color=#38761D]Combat Style [/color]: Boss 1H
[size=2][size=3]..and is unkillable
[size=5][b][size=3][size=4][color=#000000]AS ALWAYS..REPORT ME ANY ISSUE..THANK YOU![/color]
[color=#efefef]HIGHLY RACCOMANDED
- [color=#93c47d]Face Light by [b]tktk[/b] here[/color]: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?
[/color][size=3][color=#efefef][/color]
